CustomField.description: Displays the AvaTax Exemption customer status.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE(CASE(AVA_SFCLOUD__AvaTax_Message__c, "Success", "/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Success: Email address is recommended", "/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Update customer to AvaTax Exemption", "/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "","/resource/not_available", "Error","/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "/img/msg_icons/error16.png"), "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the AvaTax Exemption customer status.
CustomField.label: AvaTax Status
